name: Hell Raiser OG
description: Hell Raiser OG, bred by Archive Seed Bank, is a 60% indica-dominant cross between Fire OG and Face Off OG. After its 72-day flowering time indoors, Hell Raiser OG produces round, crystal covered buds that show off its OG lineage through a sour lemon and pine aroma. Hell Raiser OG took 1st place in the concentrates category of the 2014 High Times San Francisco Cannabis Cup.
descriptionPlain: Hell Raiser OG, bred by Archive Seed Bank, is a 60% indica-dominant cross between Fire OG and Face Off OG. After its 72-day flowering time indoors, Hell Raiser OG produces round, crystal covered buds that show off its OG lineage through a sour lemon and pine aroma. Hell Raiser OG took 1st place in the concentrates category of the 2014 High Times San Francisco Cannabis Cup.
aka: Hellraiser OG, Hell Raiser, Hellraiser, Hell Raiser OG Kush

highlightedReviews.text:
I purchased a 1/2 oz. of Hell Raiser Og today from the best delivery service in south orange ca, Blue Bird, and I am impressed by the freshness and aromas wafting up my rather large, ( according to my wife) nostrils.  
The Leafly overview is quite accurate, so I'll move on to the experience I am having.
I ground up two nice little buds for a small solo joint, rolled in one Elements ultra thin rice papers.  Please forgive me for my braggadocio when I say no one rolls a better joint. I started early back in 1972 at 15.  I don't know, perhaps it's because, as my dad said, "You have surgeons hands", but even then, I had a knack for a rolling a fine joint, and any size, depending on the occasion.
I've smoked the little joint, and it really is a fine smoke.  The Leafly report on the effects are spot on.  Nice, relaxed body, yet fully functional, as far as I am able to self observe.  I might add, "mentality stimulating ", to my quiver of wonderment derived from the smoldering smoothness of this fine herb.
Indica dominant hybrid, feels like your ideal indica that’s not too strong or too weak.

articles.title: The 2014 San Francisco Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, cannabis enthusiasts flocked to the beautiful Bay Area of California to celebrate yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. Leafly was there (attendees, you scored a Leafly tank, right?) to witness the history unfold, and we return with news of your 2014 champions. Congratulations to all of the winners and to those who placed in their category!
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Cracker Jack – Santa Cruz Mountain Naturals
2nd Place: Silver Haze – MedMar Healing Center
3rd Place: Tangerine Haze – Heirloom Genetics
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Chem Scout – IC Collective
2nd Place: Paris OG – California Naturals
3rd Place: XXX OG Kush – Life Is Good Healing
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Thin Mint Cookies – Gold Coast Collection
2nd Place: Kush Company OG Kush – Wellness Earth Energy Dispensary – W.E.E.D Studio City
3rd Place: Deathstar – San Jose Patients Group
 
 Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Hell Raiser OG – TLC Collective / Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place: XJ-13 Lemonhead – Alternative Herbal Health Services / Prime Extractions
3rd Place: J-1 – Nectar’s
 
Best Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Artisanal Cannabis Macarons – Madame Munchie
2nd Place: Hazelnug & Grub – Organicares Collective
3rd Place: Jambo – Jambo Direct
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Kottonmouth Kush x Strawberry Cough Ice Water Hash – Medibrothers
2nd Place: HGH Extractions Goji OG Solventless – Delta Health Center
3rd Place: BAMF Private Reserve Cookies – BAMF Extractions
 
Best High-CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Great White – Alpha Medic
Edibles: Medibrothers and MTG Medi-Chew High CBD – Medibrothers & MTG Seeds
Concentrates: Charlotte's Web – P.E.A.C.E. Plant Essentials And Cannabis Extracts
Photo credit: Thomas Hawk via Photopin CC
